demos.name: RWTH - Mindstorms NXT Toolbox
demos.description: The RWTH - Mindstorms NXT Toolbox provides MATLAB functions to control LEGO Mindstorms NXT robots via USB or a wireless Bluetooth connection.

demoitem.label: Play A Tone: Example to play a specific tone with the NXT Bruck and retrieve the current battery level.
Read Sound Sensor: Example to read the sound sensor value in db.
Drive Around Table: In this little demo, our bot drives a square on the floor around a well known table.
Drive Until Wall: In this litte demo our robot drives forward until it detects a wall.
Next Generation Ultrasound: This script demonstrates the results of the ultrasound "snapshot mode"!
Next Generation Ultrasound: This script demonstrates the results of the ultrasound "snapshot mode"!
Toolbox Benchmark: This script calls and times some basic toolbox functions.
Toolbox Test: This script tries to call as many toolbox functions as (reasonably) possible.
